'''''Featured Original Soundtrack (2021)''''' is ''[[Genshin Impact]]'s'' first memorial OST album recorded with {{w|Dolby Atmos}} technology. It was released on December 19, 2021. This album contains selected tracks from the three regions available in Genshin Impact: [[Mondstadt]], [[Liyue]], and [[Inazuma]], and supports the spatial audio feature.<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/genshinimpact/status/1472423184171343872 Featured Original Soundtrack Announcement]</ref>
